overview: Mariko Hitotose (Hirashima), a large newcomer, appeared at the shooting site of popular AV actresses (Kuribayashi, Kawakami, Ito). Mariko who is dissatisfied with the change from a hot-selling idol to an AV actress is free to do anything at the shooting site. Kyoko Tsuzuki (Morita), the make-up, does his best to accommodate such a scene, but the make-up room gets even hotter with the shooting staff involved. Will the shooting end safely?!
tagline: 4 months after that, again at the AV shooting site The same staff and cast gathered!
title: Makeup Room 2
